title: Happy Birthday Karan Singh Grover - Birthday special: Karan Singh Grover makes a case for all-black outfits! | The Times of India
text:
Birthday special: Karan Singh Grover makes a case for all-black outfits! TNN | Feburary 23, 2017 1 /5 Happy Birthday Karan Singh Grover 
Black is one colour that always dominates the fashion world. Be it for women or men, classic LBD or a black sleek suit, black is the go-to colour for everyone! And that also seems the case for our Birthday boy Karan Singh Grover. When it comes to trying new fashion styles or quirky indo-western outfits, Karan isn’t afraid to experiment. On his birthday, we’d like to wish Karan a very Happy Birthday and take some all-black outfits inspiration for all the boys out there: All Comments ()
